CALICE::DeadNoiseConstants

CALICE::DeadNoiseConstants Class Reference

Class to store the results of a selection of dead or noisy cells for a certain chip/channel for a fixed moduleID. More...

#include <DeadNoiseConstants.hh>

Detailed Description

Class to store the results of a selection of dead or noisy cells for a certain chip/channel for a fixed moduleID.

Author:
S. Schmidt DESY
Date:
Sep 25 2006

unsigned  channel,
int  deadLevel,
int  noiseLevel 
) [inline]

constructor, initializing with parameters

Parameters:
chip chip number of cell to be calibrated
channel channel number of cell to be calibrated
deadLevel "level" of being dead for a cell, 0: not dead, 1: dead
noiseLevel "level" of being noisy for a cell, 0: no noise, 1: low noise, 2: high noise

float CALICE::DeadNoiseConstants::applyCalibration ( float  inputValue  )  const [inline, virtual]

apply calibration to energy value

Parameters:
inputValue "energy" value before the calibration
Returns:
as the selection of non-dead/non-noisy cells has no impact on the "energy" the inputValue is returned
